text: "Kids in America" is a 1981 debut song by British singer Kim Wilde. It was taken from her self-titled debut album. It went to number 1 in Finland and South Africa, number 2 in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Sweden and number 5 in Australia and New Zealand. ==Track listing== 7" UK single #"Kids in America" – 3:26 #"Tuning in Tuning On" – 4:30 7" US/Canada single #"Kids in America" – 3:26 #"You'll Never Be So Wrong" – 4:11 ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Kim Wilde songs Category:Foo Fighters songs Category:Power pop songs
title: Kids in America
